Text: How do you patch in windows 8?

how to install in win 8?
the msi always prompt to install in local hard drive

How do you apply the generated keygen code? The instructions say to modify a file in %userprofile%AppDataRoamingGmailNotifierPro but I only have a userprofile folder and no AppData folder and searching cannot find the file "ConfigData.xml" that need needs to be modified.
Wow.. Apparently I wasn't thinking that much when I tried to find it.. If the AppData folder isn't visible for you just type the folder address into the address bar on a open folder.
